snippet: Ai Weiwei, the rebel artist, said Tuesday that a court in Beijing had agreed to hear his lawsuit against the city’s tax authorities.
abstract: Chinese dissident artist Ai Weiwei announces that a court in Beijing has agreed to hear his lawsuit against the city's tax authorities.
lead_paragraph: Ai Weiwei, the rebel artist, said Tuesday that a court in Beijing had agreed to hear his lawsuit against the city’s tax authorities.

headline.main: China: Court to Hear Artist’s Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: China: Court to Hear Artist’s Lawsuit
